text:
Boosted Boards | Backend/Full Stack | Mountain View, CA | ONSITE | boostedboards.com

It's a truly beautiful world when commuters can go uphill at 20mph on a skateboard. Boosted is all about getting people where they want to be in the most fun way possible. We're looking for someone to help us on our backend systems, both internal and external. You can apply here[0] or email me directly[1]
